com.cloudera.director.spi.v2.database.util

Class AbstractDatabaseServerInstance<T extends DatabaseServerInstanceTemplate,D>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cloudera.director.spi.v2.model.util.AbstractResource<T,D>
      • com.cloudera.director.spi.v2.model.util.AbstractInstance<T,D>
        • com.cloudera.director.spi.v2.database.util.AbstractDatabaseServerInstance<T,D>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of database server instance template from which database server instances are constructed
    D - the type of instance details
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    DatabaseServerInstance<T>, Instance<T>, Resource<T>

    public abstract class AbstractDatabaseServerInstance<T extends DatabaseServerInstanceTemplate,D>
extends AbstractInstance<T,D>
implements DatabaseServerInstance<T>
    Abstract base class for database server instance implementations.
